verbose_text: Further, PLX4032 and PLX4720 concentration-dependently enhanced the toxicity of the ABCG2 substrate mitoxantrone in UKF-NB-3 ABCG2 cells but not of non transduced UKF-NB-3 cells or UKF-NB-3 cells transduced with a control vector (Additional file 2 : Table S1) as indicated by MTT assay after five day incubation.
evidence: PLX4720 concentration-dependently enhanced the toxicity of the ABCG2 substrate mitoxantrone
